original_title: Xizang writes new chapter in development
article_summary: "Xizang Achieves Remarkable Economic and Social Progress: In the past six decades, Xizang has made significant strides in economic development, with a GDP of 276.49 billion yuan in 2024, a growing digital economy, and improved infrastructure. Notably, the region has eradicated poverty and improved living standards, with per capita GDP reaching 75,237 yuan in 2024."</s>
